verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, you \w have|strong="H1121"\w* been favourable \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1121"\w* land. You \w have|strong="H1121"\w* restored \w the|strong="H1121"\w* fortunes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jacob.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* forgiven \w the|strong="H3068"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* people. \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* covered \w all|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* sin. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H5375"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* wrath. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* turned \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fierceness \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w anger|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w*, God \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* indignation towards \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cease|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w angry|strong="H3708"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* forever? \w Will|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w draw|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H3708"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* generations?
Wonâ€™t \w you|strong="H1755"\w* revive us again, \w that|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H4900"\w* people \w may|strong="H1755"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H1755"\w* \w you|strong="H1755"\w*?
Show \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* loving kindness, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. Grant \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* salvation.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* hear \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* speak peace \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* holy ones; \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* again \w to|strong="H3068"\w* folly.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* salvation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* near \w those|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* fear \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w may|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land.
Mercy \w and|strong="H3519"\w* truth meet together. Righteousness \w and|strong="H3519"\w* peace \w have|strong="H7138"\w* kissed each other.
Truth springs out \w of|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7965"\w* earth. \w Righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* has looked down \w from|strong="H7965"\w* heaven.

Yes, \w the|strong="H8064"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* give \w that|strong="H8064"\w* which \w is|strong="H6664"\w* good. Our \w land|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* yield its increase.
Righteousness goes before \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prepares \w the|strong="H5414"\w* way \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* steps.
